adept.common

Class OntType

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.OntType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IType

    public class OntType
extends Object
implements IType
    The Class OntType, which represents one concept from an ontology, where the ontology formally represents knowledge as a set of concepts within a domain using a shared vocabulary.
